CustomField.description: To show in separate stock (Existing stock, incoming stock, promotional stock, stock to indent)
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Status__c, "FREE"), OR(ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Purchase_Status__c, "Confirmed"), ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Purchase_Status__c, "In Shipment"), ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Purchase_Status__c, "Arrived")), !ISBLANK(TEXT(Stock_Promotion_Status__c)) ), "Promotional Stock", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Status__c, "FREE"), ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Purchase_Status__c, "Arrived"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Stock_Promotion_Status__c)) ), "Existing Stock", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Status__c, "FREE"), OR(ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Purchase_Status__c, "Confirmed"), ISPICKVAL(Vehicle_Purchase_Status__c, "In Shipment")), ISBLANK(TEXT(Stock_Promotion_Status__c)) ), "Incoming Stock", "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Vehicle Type For Sale
